scope_of_work: Global Services Co. will provide IT consulting services, including software development and system maintenance, as described in Appendix A.

payment_terms.late_payment_interest: 2% per month for payments overdue by more than 15 days

termination_clause.termination_notice: Either party may terminate this agreement with 30 days' written notice.
termination_clause.termination_for_convenience: Global Services Co. reserves the right to terminate this agreement for convenience upon 60 days' written notice to Tech Solutions Inc.
termination_clause.termination_for_cause: Either party may terminate this agreement immediately for material breach by the other party.

confidentiality.confidential_information: Both parties agree to keep all confidential information received during the contract term confidential and not disclose it to third parties.
confidentiality.confidentiality_duration: Confidentiality obligations shall survive the termination of this agreement for a period of 3 years.

indemnification_clause.indemnification_scope: Global Services Co. agrees to indemnify and hold harmless Tech Solutions Inc. from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from Global Services Co.'s performance under this agreement.
indemnification_clause.indemnification_limit: Global Services Co.'s total liability for indemnification shall not exceed 150% of the total contract value.

dispute_resolution.mediation: In the event of a dispute, both parties agree to first attempt to resolve it through mediation before pursuing legal action.
dispute_resolution.jurisdiction: Any legal action arising from this agreement shall be brought in the state courts of California.

insurance_requirements.insurance_coverage: Global Services Co. shall maintain comprehensive general liability insurance with a minimum coverage of $2,000,000 during the contract term.
insurance_requirements.certificate_of_insurance: Global Services Co. shall provide Tech Solutions Inc. with a certificate of insurance as proof of coverage.

governing_law: This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California.

negotiation_history.change: Adjusted payment schedule to monthly payments.
Accepted monthly payment schedule. Requested clarification on termination notice period.
Agreed to maintain a 30-day termination notice period as requested.
Requested an increase in the indemnification limit to 150% of the total contract value.
Accepted the increase in the indemnification limit.
